skills.name: Chain Lightning
skills.desc: Zaps the enemy and briefly stuns. 25 power, 2T cd.

skills.name: Lightning Bolt
skills.desc: Quick bolt that shocks the target. 15 power, 1T cd.

skills.name: Static Shield
skills.desc: Creates a damage-absorbing shield. 35 power, 3T cd.

skills.name: Hunter's Mark
skills.desc: Marks the target, slowing it and boosting your next hit. 10 power, 3T cd.
skills.dungeon_desc: Marks target: -15% evasion, slows 2T, boosts next hit. 10 power, 3T cd.
skills.arena_desc: Marks target with flat slow. No bleed needed. 10 power, 8s cd.

skills.name: Bloodlust
skills.desc: Frenzy mode: extra attack and lifesteal. 20 power, 4T cd.
skills.dungeon_desc: Extra attack this turn + 15% lifesteal. 20 power, 4T cd.
skills.arena_desc: Bonus hit + 15% lifesteal. Requires 2+ bleeds. 20 power, 12s cd.

skills.name: Summon Pet
skills.desc: Summons a combat companion. 25 power, 5T cd.
skills.dungeon_desc: Summons a Spirit Beast for 3 turns. Attacks on its own turn. 25 power, 5T cd.
skills.arena_desc: Calls a pet strike dealing 50% base DMG. 25 power, 15s cd.

skills.name: Shadow Step
skills.desc: Teleport behind the enemy and enter stealth. 20 power, 1T cd.
skills.dungeon_desc: Enter stealth. Next attack deals 3x damage. 20 power, 1T cd.
skills.arena_desc: Teleport behind enemy (if far) and enter stealth. 20 power, 3.5s cd.

skills.name: Envenom
skills.desc: Coats weapons in poison, dealing DoT. 20 power, 3T cd.
skills.dungeon_desc: Deals 50% DMG + applies 2 poison stacks (3 turns). 20 power, 3T cd.
skills.arena_desc: Coats weapons in poison, dealing DoT over time. 20 power, 8s cd.

skills.name: Smoke Bomb
skills.desc: Drops smoke, greatly boosting evasion. 30 power, 4T cd.
skills.dungeon_desc: Greatly boosts evasion for 2 turns. 30 power, 4T cd.
skills.arena_desc: Drops smoke cloud, greatly boosting evasion briefly. 30 power, 12s cd.

skills.name: Charge
skills.desc: Rush at enemy dealing heavy damage and stunning. Free, 2T cd.
skills.dungeon_desc: Heavy damage (1.5x DMG + DEF) and stun. Free, 2T cd.
skills.arena_desc: Rush at enemy from distance and stun. Min range 50. Free, 5.5s cd.

skills.name: War Cry
skills.desc: Shout that slows and weakens nearby enemies. Free, 3T cd.
skills.dungeon_desc: Weakens monster attack by ~15% for 2T. Free, 3T cd.
skills.arena_desc: Shout that slows, weakens, and deals DEF-based damage. No range limit. Free, 10s cd.

skills.name: Frost Nova
skills.desc: Frost burst that damages and slows. Freezes shocked targets. 20 power, 2T cd.

skills.name: Arcane Drain
skills.desc: Drains life from enemy, healing yourself. 20 power, 3T cd.

skills.name: Rupture
skills.desc: Detonates all bleed stacks for burst damage. 15 power, 2T cd.

skills.name: Marked for Death
skills.desc: Marks target vulnerable, taking bonus damage. 15 power, 3T cd.
skills.dungeon_desc: Target takes +12-20% bonus damage for 2T. 15 power, 2T cd.
skills.arena_desc: Marks target vulnerable, taking +8-16% bonus damage. 15 power, 10s cd.

skills.name: Lacerate
skills.desc: Slash deals more damage the lower target HP. Applies bleed. 25 power, 3T cd.

skills.name: Riposte
skills.desc: Counter stance: auto-strikes back when hit. 20 power, 3T cd.

skills.name: Battle Trance
skills.desc: Converts defense into attack power for 3 turns. Free, 3T cd.

skills.name: Thorns
skills.desc: Reflects damage taken back at attackers. Free, 4T cd.

ultimates.name: Thunderstorm
ultimates.desc: 5 lightning strikes that damage and heal. Triggers at 25% HP.

ultimates.name: Rain of Fire
ultimates.desc: Become invulnerable and set enemy ablaze. Triggers at 20% HP.
ultimates.dungeon_desc: Invulnerable 1T, 2+ extra attacks, burn 3T. Manual activation.
ultimates.arena_desc: Become invulnerable and set enemy ablaze. Auto-triggers at 20% HP.

ultimates.name: Death Mark
ultimates.desc: Marks enemy for death; stored damage detonates. Triggers at 20% HP.
ultimates.dungeon_desc: All damage stored for 2+ turns, then 75% detonates. Manual activation.
ultimates.arena_desc: Marks enemy; stored damage detonates after delay. Auto-triggers at 20% HP.

ultimates.name: Berserker Rage
ultimates.desc: Massively boosts attack speed and damage. Triggers at 30% HP.

ultimates.name: Arcane Overload
ultimates.desc: Massive burst + burn. All spells free for 4s. Triggers at 25% HP.

ultimates.name: Primal Fury
ultimates.desc: Beast mode: extra attack, poison hits, lifesteal. Triggers at 20% HP.

ultimates.name: Shadow Dance
ultimates.desc: Permanent stealth with rapid attacks. Triggers at 20% HP.

ultimates.name: Last Stand
ultimates.desc: Cannot die for several seconds. Triggers at 30% HP.
